title: Cisco Secure Web Appliance: L4TM Logs
description: The Cisco Secure Web Appliances L4TM logs dashboard provides detailed insights into the Layer-4 traffic monitoring logs generated by Cisco Secure Web Appliance. It includes total number of L4TM logs, Firewall list, actions, blocked domain details and more.

definition.content:
**Dashboard Overview**

- The Cisco Secure Web Appliances L4TM logs dashboard provides detailed insights into the Layer-4 traffic monitoring logs generated by Cisco Secure Web Appliance. It includes total number of L4TM logs, Firewall list, actions, blocked domain details and more.

For more information, see the [Cisco Secure Web Appliance Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/cisco_secure_web_appliance/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Cisco Secure Web Appliance logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).

definition.title: Top 10 Actions taken on Data Transfer
Distribution of Destination IPs by Firewall List and Action
